line.text: ＜フィオーレ王国。
line.translation: The Kingdom of Fiore...

line.text: 人口１，７００万の永世中立国。
line.translation: It's a stable neutral country with a population of 17 million.

line.text: そこは 魔法の世界。
line.translation: It is a world filled with magic.

line.text: 魔法は 普通に売り買いされ 人々の生活に根づいていた。
line.translation: Magic is traded like common goods. It has become a part of daily life.

line.text: そして その魔法を駆使して 生業とする者どもがいる。
line.translation: And there are people who use magic to make a living.

line.text: 人々は 彼らを魔導士と呼んだ。
line.translation: Those people are called "Mages".

line.text: 魔導士たちは さまざまなギルドに属し→
line.translation: Mages belong to various guilds and perform their jobs on request.

line.text: 依頼に応じて仕事をする。
line.translation: Mages belong to various guilds and perform their jobs on request.

line.text: そのギルド 国内に多数。
line.translation: Countless guilds have been formed in this country.

line.text: そして とある街に とある魔導士ギルドがある。
line.translation: And there's a certain mage guild located in a city.

line.text: かつて いや 後々に至るまで 数々の伝説を生み出した ギルド。
line.translation: In past times... no, even now, it's still creating legends... Its name is...

line.text: その名は… フェアリーテイル＞
line.translation: Its name is... ...Fairy Tail. Fairy, where are you going
I'll collect all the light to make your future shine
Oh yeah, can you hear my voice?
Oh yeah, I'm screaming it out with my virile voice
Oh yeah, I'll scream until my voice reaches your heart
Oh yeah, oh yeah
Like the moon and sun's high touch
Didn't you forget anything?
I won't be able to find what I desire
If your amusing presence isn't by my side
Snowing, the times we got close to each other
Brought forth your honest smile
Fairy, where are you going
I'll collect all the light to make your future shine
Don't say goodbye

line.text: ＜港町 ハルジオン＞
line.translation: The port city, Hargeon.

line.text: あ… あの… お客様。
line.translation: U-Um, mister?

line.text: （ハッピー）ナツ 着いたよ ハルジオン。 起きて起きて！
line.translation: Natsu! We've arrived at Hargeon! Get up! Get up! I-Is he alright?

line.text: だ… 大丈夫ですか？ あい！ いつものことだから。
line.translation: I-Is he alright? Yes! This happens all the time.

line.text: （ナツ）ムリ… もう二度と列車には乗んねえ。
line.translation: It is hopeless. I will never ride a train ever again...

line.text: 情報が確かなら この街に サラマンダーがいるはずだよ。
line.translation: If the information is correct, Salamander should be in this town. Let's go.

line.text: 行こう。 ちょ… ちょっと休ませて。
line.translation: Let's go. L-Let me rest for a little bit...

line.text: 助けて～！
line.translation: Save me!!

line.text: （汽笛）
line.translation: It departed.

line.text: 発車しちゃった。
line.translation: It departed. Fairy Tail
Fairy Tail What?

line.text: （ルーシィ）え～っ！ この街って 魔法屋１軒しかないの！？
line.translation: What? This is the only magic store in this town?

line.text: えぇ。 もともと魔法より 漁業が盛んな街ですからね。
line.translation: Yes. Because fishing is more prosperous than magic in this town.

line.text: 街の者も 魔法を使えるのは １割もいませんで→
line.translation: Only 10% of the citizens can use magic.

line.text: この店も ほぼ 旅の魔導士 専門ですわ。
line.translation: This store is mainly for traveling mages.

line.text: あ～ぁ ムダ足だったかしらねぇ。
line.translation: Ah~ I guess I came here for nothing. Well, well, before saying that take a look at this, please.

line.text: まぁまぁ そう言わずに見てってくださいな。
line.translation: Well, well, before saying that take a look at this, please. I have lots of new goods, too!

line.text: 新商品だって ちゃんと揃ってますよ。
line.translation: I have lots of new goods, too! This Color Magic is probably the most popular one among girls!

line.text: 女の子に人気なのは このカラーズの魔法かな。
line.translation: This Color Magic is probably the most popular one among girls!

line.text: その日の気分に合わせて 服の色を→
line.translation: You can change your clothes' color depending on your mood. Just say "Change"! I already have it.

line.text: チェンジってね！
line.translation: Just say "Change"! I already have it. Youhou!

line.text: 持ってるし…。 私はゲートのカギの 強力なヤツ探してるの。
line.translation: I already have it. Youhou!

line.text: ゲートか… 珍しいねぇ。
line.translation: I already have it. Youhou!
